font-family: 微软雅黑; font-weight: normal; color: #000000; font-style: normal

item.answer:
【考法 1】 adj. 有优越感的：displaying a patronizingly superior attitude
【例】treat sb. in a condescending manner 以有优越感的态度对待某人
【近】patronizing
【派】condescension n. 屈尊俯就：patronizing attitude or behavior
